artist: Israhel van Meckenem; after Master E.S.
text: The four Evangelists appear from right to left: John (top), Luke (right), Matthew (bottom), Mark (left); the Fathers of the Church from right to left: Augustine (top right), Ambrose (bottom right), Gregory (bottom left), Jerome (top left).
title: St. John in the Desert Surrounded by Symbols of the Four Evangelists and the Four Fathers of the Church
